moduleMetadataJson.name: LibreOffice 6.03 /Apache OpenOffice 4.1.5 Malicious ODT File Generator
moduleMetadataJson.description: Generates a Malicious ODT File which can be used with auxiliary/server/capture/smb or similar to capture hashes.
author: Richard Davy - secureyourit.co.uk

options.name: WORKSPACE
options.description: Specify the workspace for this module

options.name: DisablePayloadHandler
options.description: Disable the handler code for the selected payload

options.name: LHOST
options.description: IP Address of SMB Listener that the .odt document points to
